message.content:
{
  "weekly_summary": "Momentum broadened through the week. Exchanges (BSE, CDSL) and telecom/data (TATACOMM) posted strong breakouts on heavy volume. PSU banks stayed firm (UNIONBANK, INDIANB, IDBI), while select private banks (RBLBANK) showed steady higher closes. Consumer/platform names (NYKAA) improved with rising volumes. Metals (HINDCOPPER) were volatile but finished the week above Monday levels. Bias: moderately risk-on; deploy cash selectively into strength.",
  "trades": [
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "BSE",
      "shares": 1,
      "amount": 2385.00,
      "reason": "Strong multi-day breakout with rising volumes; sector (exchanges/depositories) showing leadership."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "TATACOMM",
      "shares": 1,
      "amount": 1870.20,
      "reason": "Range breakout to new highs on very high volume; follow-through likely if market risk-on persists."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "RBLBANK",
      "shares": 10,
      "amount": 2916.00,
      "reason": "Four-day uptrend with higher closes and solid volume; relative strength among mid/small financials."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "IDBI",
      "shares": 20,
      "amount": 1869.20,
      "reason": "PSU banking momentum; steady higher highs/lows through the week with controlled volatility."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "NYKAA",
      "shares": 10,
      "amount": 2651.90,
      "reason": "Improving trend and volumes; reclaimed and held weekly highs, offering a favorable risk/reward."
    }
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 2138.20,
    "total_value": 25752.25,
    "holdings_count": 7,
    "holdings": [
      "HINDCOPPER: 25 units",
      "BEL: 8 units",
      "BSE: 1 units",
      "TATACOMM: 1 units",
      "RBLBANK: 10 units",
      "IDBI: 20 units",
      "NYKAA: 10 units"
    ],
    "weekly_pnl": "+0.7%"
  },
  "screening_changes": [
    "Remove RAJESHEXPO: persistently low liquidity and no momentum edge.",
    "Remove VSTIND: thin volumes; limited trend participation.",
    "Remove CHOLAHLDNG: low liquidity/holding-company discount; weak momentum fit.",
    "Remove RATNAMANI: very low traded volumes in this period; better opportunities elsewhere.",
    "Remove BIRLACORPN: choppy with inconsistent volumes; fails momentum/quality screen."
  ]
}
